item.title: the beginning
item.description:
Starting this photography hobby has pushed me to go out more — further afield, off my usual paths.

It’s also had a surprising effect: I’m more aware of things.

A thing could be anything — but I’ve started noticing framing, composition, and the mood of a view. I don’t just think “oh look, a tree” anymore. I see how that tree stands in its space, how it frames the scene, how it affects the feeling of what’s around it.
